phrases: Cannot something fun happen for once?
Every single day bores me to death.
Words, huh?
That is all you have been about these days.
The Shiny Rod will lead me to the Words!
When can I expect the materials I requested of you?
She said Cavendish, right?
I wonder if something happened to Diana.
Cavendish?
I wonder if something happened to Diana.
I was at the club the other night, and I heard that the legendary Holy Grail is at Brightonberry.
I remember Appleton Academy...
It is a famous school bearing more than one thousand years of history.
What surprised me more is that you are looking for the Words.
Unfortunately, researchers of modern magic are not prone to know much about ancient magic.
But if you can discover the seven Words, that may she would some light on why Chariot du Nord disappeared...
Appleton is famous for its hatred of witches.
That is some crazy stuff...
Damn, girl...
So this is that famous, age-old school?
This is that famous school steeped in tradition?
Metamorphie Westes!
I will take the hit for us and get myself expelled.
That is all there is to it.
I will take the hit for us and get expelled.
That is all there is to it.
Here.
Who do those country's supporters think they are?
We will suppress you in every direct confrontation.
Our dignity will be put on the line with tonight's kickoff.
I am always saying that our Prime Minister is weak.
Compromise?
What our country truly needs is...
Is that how a Louis Blackwell is spoken to?
Is that how you speak to me knowing I am Louis Blackwell?
Like hell I know you!
Well, that is a surprise.
I never expected to meet a student who did not show proper respect to a Blackwell.
Why you!
Amanda, chill out!
I thought we eradicated them with the familiar exterminator!
Rats are witches familiars!
Their underlings!
We had them all eliminated in order to prevent the witches from deceiving and corrupting our holy place of learning!
We eliminated them all to prevent the witches from deceiving and corrupting our holy place of learning!
You think I would really say Yes, of course and do whatever you want?
This is a normal rat that would get hunted by a fox if you threw it in a field.
You do not have a problem with that, I presume?
Do you have a problem with that?
To what do we owe the honor of witches?
How would I be able to look for the Words then?
Obviously!
Everything is to become a witch who can give people dreams like she did.
S-Sure, nobody may want me to do it...
I cannot understand why you go to such lengths when nobody has asked you to.
Life is not about my wants.
The things I must do have been decided.
No matter how much I fail or lose heart, it is something I decided for myself.
I will become someone who can make everyone laugh and fill their hearts with excitement like Chariot!
What if you are unable to fulfill your dream?
I will fulfill it!
And I will not give up before I fulfill it!
So if I could ask a favor of you...
What good would it do to sow the seeds of disorder in a troublemaker...
Those...
What are they?
That is a pretty dirty trick you are using.
Want To cheat, you better learn from the best.
If you want to cheat, learn from the best.
Why, you!
Crap, I forgot Akko still had the leyline router!
Do not get caught, Akko.
The verdict is guilty, the punishment torture, of course.
There is a proper way for respected members of our glorious Appleton to resolve conflicts!
Fine then.
the two parties are allowed to engage in a fair duel under the watchful eyes of the knight statue.
the two parties are allowed to engage in a fair duel under the protection of the knight statue.
It is been a tradition since our founding.
If you win, I will free both the rat and Grail.
But if you lose, both you and the rat will be judged, and the Grail will be broken.
What the?!
I do not need to fight a witch fair and square!
There is no need to fight fairly against a witch!
It would be a waste for a bastard like you!
A witch without magic is more worthless than a commoner!
Looks like this match is over.
Was this a good enough experience for the Word?
Is this a good enough experience for the Word?
Hey, is this supposed to be that Word magic?
Hey, hey, is supposed to be that Word magic?
Shit, if I could at least use magic...
Adrew!
Huh?
It is those again...
Oh, Louis!
Look what the witch has done to you!
You may be a Hanbridge, but how will you explain what is happened to my son?!
It is indeed the case that she trespassed into our school.
As you are aware, when two parties disagree they may face each other here.
Before I knew what came over me, the situation was chaotic and I was on the verge of death.
She saved my life.
You are actually feeling guilty for once.
Yeah, I am.
I know you just feel refreshed since you got to go wild.
True that!
I am never bored when you are around.
It would not be any fun without you here, so do not even think of quitting.
Cannot something interesting happen for once?
I am just bored to death every single day.
It is all rules, work, and punishment.
I am getting outta this stuffy school for good.
When is that?
Tomorrow.
You said the same thing just the other day.
I mean it this time!
Anyway, what is got you so focused?
Doing research about the Words.
The Words, huh?
That is all you have been about these days.
If I keep looking for the Words, I am sure I will find Chariot!
And it is the Shiny Rod that will lead me to the Words!
Professor Ursula!
Look, the Shiny Rod!
The fifth Word, I see.
This one is related to ancient history and tradition.
History and tradition?
Yes, it is
Professor Ursula!
When can I expect the materials I requested you to collect?
M-My apologies!
I will be right there!
Honestly, and right when the Cavendish family is having a crisis...
Sorry, Akko!
Just give me a minute.
Heave-ho!
The Cavendish family?
I wonder if something happened to Diana.
Forget Diana!
I was at the club the other night, and I heard that the legendary Holy Grail is in Brightonbury.
The legendary Holy Grail?
Rumor says the Grail's been carefully tucked away over in Appleton Academy.
Seems that it was used in one of Appleton's traditional ceremonies of some sort.
And Appleton Academy was...
It is a famous school with over one thousand years of history to its name.
Professor Croix!
Sorry, I did not intend to eavesdrop.
That said, I was surprised to learn that you are looking for the Words.
Do you know about the Words?
Maybe you have some idea of the one that is related to history and tradition?
I am sorry to disappoint, but researchers of modern magic tend not to be well read in ancient magic.
Ugh...
But discovering the seven Words may she would some light on why Chariot du Nord disappeared...
Looks like we got to go.
But Professor Ursula...
What?!
Whatever, let us go!
Hey, wait!
Amanda!
Take care.
Appleton is famous for its disdain of witches.
The legendary Holy Grail...
Take action!
Take action!
Raise your hands!
Raise your hands!
Release the shutter on this scene like it is the moment of a lifetime
One scene shattaa kiru you ni setsuna wo utsushite

Little Witch Academia
Little Witch Academia
This is crazy...
So this is that famous, traditional school?
I feel hella out of place here.
In trouble will not be the half of it if they find us.
Metamorphie Vestesse!
I will take the hit for us and get myself expelled.
You do not need to worry.
That joke is not funny.
Andrew!
Lend me that!
There you go.
Metamorphie Faciesse!
He is the son of some Earl or something, right?
All right, let us go hunt for the Holy Grail!
Why the heck's this place so big?
Where are you, Holy Grail?
Who do those foreign supporters think they are?
Just wait until we put the thumbscrews on you when we next meet.
Our honor is on the line with tonight's kickoff.
Whether in soccer or politics, we will crush them and silence their nation for good.
As I always say, our Prime Minister is just too soft.
He values compromise?
What our country truly needs is...
Strong statesmen!
Strong statesmen!
Well said, son.
You too, Father.
Call me Chairman here!
Yes, Chairman.
Whoops, my bad.
I do not recognize you.
What class are you in?
Who knows?
I cannot recall.
What is with that attitude?!
Huh?!
Are you speaking to me like that knowing I am Louis Blackwell?
Like hell I would even know you!
Color me surprised, then.
I never expected to find a student at Appleton lacking respect for a Blackwell.
My father is the Chairman and this country's Minister of Defense!
Oh, is that so?
You will have to excuse my rudeness!
Back off!
Why, you...!
Amanda, settle down!
What have you got there?
Show me.
S-Squeak.
A rat!
There was still a rat!
The familiar exterminator was supposed to eradicate them all!
Familiar exterminator?
Rats are the witches' familiars!
Their underlings!
We had them all eliminated in order to prevent the deception and corruption of witches in our holy place of learning!
What kind of school is this?
Hand it over!
And now you expect an obedient Yes, of course!
from me, right?
What is going on, Louis?
He has a familiar!
Come now, are you serious?
This is an ordinary rat, no more than fodder for foxes if you threw it in a field.
I will let it outside.
Can I presume you take no issue?
Hmph, pompous prick.
So?
What gives us the honor of a visit from witches?
Why did you have to try and start a fight?!
How would I have been able to look for the Word then?
Oh, shut it!
I do not give a rat's ass about the Words.
Then why did you even come?
I wanted to go out with a bang before I quit Luna Nova.
That is so selfish!
Yeah, what of it?
I will do what I want.
You are on your own too.
Wh-What is with you?
I suppose I should at least ask.
Why are you here?
I came to find a Word.
There are seven ancient Words that make up a spell,
and I am going to find Chariot along with them.
You still admire that witch?
Obviously!
Becoming a witch who can give people dreams like she did means everything to me!
Even though nobody wishes that of you?
S-Sure, maybe nobody wants me to do it...
I cannot understand why you would go to such lengths when nobody ever asked you to.
It is because I want to do it!
Are not you the same?
Have not I told you before?
There is a certain conduct expected of a Hanbridge.
Everyone around me expects me to become a great leader of this country.
I have a responsibility to answer them.
You go on about expectations and responsibility, but is that really what you want to do?
Life is not about what you want.
The things I must do have already been decided.
Nothing is decided.
No matter how much I fail or lose heart, this is something I decided for myself.
I will become someone who can make everyone laugh and fill their hearts with excitement, like Chariot!
And what if you are unable to fulfill your dream?
I will fulfill it!
I will never give up until I do!
So I have a favor to ask...
Do you know anything about the legendary Holy Grail?
Even if I did, I have no obligation to tell you.
What good would it do to sow the seeds of disaster in a troublemaker...
Like... you...
Those...
What are they?
Is not this...
The legendary Holy Grail?
Found it!
I have got to tell Amanda!
Justice!
Good game!
Louis beat us again.
Lady Luck has her eye on me.
Please smile upon me next.
You will not catch her attention that easily.
That is one dirty trick you are pulling there.
Wh-What are you talking about?
Look.
Stop!
Hey, Louis!
Whoa, let me explain.
I saw through your bluff.
If you want to cheat, you better learn from the best.
Why, you...!
Oh, you want some?
I-Is not that
Oruihon Deance!
Crap, I forgot Akko's still got the leyline router on her!
It is a witch!
No wonder I did not recognize you!
Hey, goddammit!
Let me go!
Which means that rat is one too.
Little Witch Academia
Little Witch Academia
There.
That one's coming off!
This does not feel right.
Did something happen to Amanda?
Done, next is over here!
We are busted!
Amanda!
What motive brought you to Appleton?
No matter.
We will figure it out once we capture the rat.
There are ways of making you talk.
Do not get yourself caught, Akko.
Amanda!
Are you okay?
I am coming to save you!
Stay away, stupid!
Why did you try to rescue me?
We will have more chances to escape!
Let us begin the witch trial.
The verdict is guilty and the punishment torture, of course.
That is not a trial at all!
That are not a trial or anything!
Is not this how it is always been?
Witches are meant to receive judgement.
By the way...
What is this?
Stop, not that!
You seriously found the Holy Grail?
It is something you witches need?
We will have to break it!
Stop!
What is going on?!
So that is it.
Are you planning to interfere, Andrew?!
Louis, I have no intention of criticizing your ideology.
But at the same time, I cannot see you as a gentleman!
We are simply passing judgement on the intruding witches!
True, those girls trespassed on our campus.
But I will not condone a violent punishment.
As respectable members of our renowned school, we have an established way to resolve conflicts.
Fine, then.
I will take you up on it!
In the case of irreconcilable differences at our academy,
the two parties are allowed to engage in a fair duel under the watchful eyes of the knight statues.
This is a tradition that goes back to our very founding.
If you win, I will release both the rat and the Grail.
But if you lose, both you and the rat will receive judgement, and the Grail will be broken to bits.
Amanda, this might be the key to reviving a Word.
For real?
It is one of your experiences?
Well...
What are you mumbling about?
En garde!
We begin when this falls.
What the?!
The hell're you doing?!
It did not fall yet!
There is no need to fight a witch fair and square!
Amanda!
Fall!
What is wrong?
Why not use some of your fabled magic?
That would mean wasting it on a bastard like you!
A witch without magic is worth even less than a commoner!
Keep babbling!
I do not need to answer to you!
Damn!
You are finished!
We have a winner, would not you say?
Yay!
Amanda, that was so cool!
Was this a good enough experience for the Word?
Maybe.
I do not know.
Huh?!
Shit!
As if I would give this...
Hey, what do you think you are doing?!
To a witch!
What the heck?
Huh?
What happened?
Hey now, is this supposed to be that Word magic?
Help me!
What is that thing?
No, that is not a Word at all!
Explain what is going on!
Do not ask me!
This was your Holy Grail!
You are breaking the rules here.
Shit, if only I could use magic...
Crap!
Look out!
Aw man...
I-I meant to do that!
Found it!
Andrew!
Get this to Amanda!
Amanda!
Catch!
Thanks!
Now that I have got this...
Eat this!
Huh?
It is those things again...
Well, whatever.
You okay?
Th-Thanks...
Amanda!
Sorry about the Grail, Akko.
There is no way that thing was related to a Word.
It must have been a demon sealed inside it a long time ago or something.
You sure?
More importantly...
This looks pretty bad...
What is the meaning of this?!
Father...
A witch?
So it was your doing!
Oh, Louis!
Look what that witch has done to you!
Capture her at once!
Respond!
Do not just stand there!
You are mistaken.
Andrew!
Are you protecting the witch?
You may be a Hanbridge, but how will you explain what is happened to my son?!
It is indeed the case that this girl trespassed on our school grounds.
In response, Louis proposed to enact a cruel and unusual punishment.
As you are aware, parties in disagreement may face each other in this place.
They simply followed Appleton's tradition.
She ended up winning their duel.
Were you brainwashed by that witch?
I was not, Father.
Before I knew what came over me, the situation devolved into chaos and I found myself on the verge of death.
This girl saved my life.
It was all my fault!
Wh-What are you saying?
I will take care of the rest.
You have finished your business here, have not you?
Get going.
Um, thanks for saving me.
Also, uh...
Did not you get what you came for?
Go.
Akko, about today...
I am sorry for all the crazy stuff I caused.
You are actually feeling guilty for once.
Well, guess I am.
But you feel refreshed too, now that you got to go wild!
Cannot say I do not!
I sure do not get bored when you are around.
And it would not be any fun without you around either, so do not even think of quitting!
Cannot make any promises.
I want to go on more adventures with you!
Like this?
What are you doing?!
Case 622: Experiment complete.
